name: Semi Truck World Rally - ( 3D Racing Game )
name_original: Semi Truck World Rally - ( 3D Racing Game )
description:
Think you are up for this challenge?
Semi Truck World Rally - ( 3D Racing Game )
The aim here is to finish the mission as fast as possible. See how quickly you can do it and perform some fantastic stunts on the way! fast and furious is much more fun!

Game Features
- Incredible physics engine that provides realistic-looking vehicle
- Unique ,Easy and smooth gameplay
- Exciting
- Different terrains/location
- EASY controls with only 2 buttons
- CRAZY jumps and loops
- Beautiful off-road terrains
- Many Levels With Stunning 3 Dimensional Graphics
- Intelligent Missions To Give You A Tough Competition.
- Crazy Addictive Experience.
- Environments That Keeps Changing
- Real Animations And Physics

Download Now :- Semi Truck World Rally - ( 3D Racing Game )
